MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY16 postcode area of St. Andrews, affecting properties in Shields Avenue and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3:15pm due to an immediate safety issue on Shields Avenue and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:16pm on 15th November 2020.
